Ball View PDF Abstract: This is the second of three articles on the topic of truncation as an operation on divisible abelian lattice-ordered groups, or simply $\ell$-groups. This article uses the notation and terminology of the first article and assumes its results. In particular, we refer to an $\ell$-group with truncation as a truncated $\ell$-group, or simply a trunc, and denote the category of truncs with truncation morphisms by $\mathbf{AT}$. Computer Science > Computers and Society
========================================


**arXiv:1406.7515v2** (cs)


This paper has been withdrawn by Nurassyl Kerimbayev
[Submitted on 29 Jun 2014 ([v1](https://arxiv.org/abs/1406.7515v1)), last revised 30 Nov 2016 (this version, v2)]

Title:Evaluation of educational activities ungraded school teachers: development resources to improve the quality of teaching in a rural school
===============================================================================================================================================

Authors:[Nurassyl Kerimbayev](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Kerimbayev,+N), [Aliya Akramova](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Akramova,+A), [Nurgul Azieva](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Azieva,+N) View a PDF of the paper titled Evaluation of educational activities ungraded school teachers: development resources to improve the quality of teaching in a rural school, by Nurassyl Kerimbayev and 2 other authors
[No PDF available, click to view other formats](#other)
> Abstract:The focus of this article are issues related to the assessment of the teacher, working in small schools. The author analyzes the educational activities ungraded school teacher, as one of the factors increasing the quality of teaching in a rural school. We have tried to consider other resources to successfully solve the problem of increasing the quality of education in rural schools. Teacher in a rural school is a key figure in the training, development and education of children. From his profession, qualification, ability to work with a small but different age student population is entirely dependent and learning outcomes of students. Therefore, the educational activities of teachers of small schools should be analyzed and monitored not only for assessing his work, but with the aim to provide all possible assistance in the specific conditions of ungraded schools.


| Comments: | *the structure of the article is wrong* |
| --- | --- |
| Subjects: | Computers and Society (cs.CY) |
| Cite as: | [arXiv:1406.7515](https://arxiv.org/abs/1406.7515) [cs.CY] |
|  | (or  [arXiv:1406.7515v2](https://arxiv.org/abs/1406.7515v2) [cs.CY] for this version) |
|  | <https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.1406.7515>  Focus to learn more    arXiv-issued DOI via DataCite |

Computer Science > Computers and Society

**arXiv:1406.7515v2** (cs)


This paper has been withdrawn by Nurassyl Kerimbayev
[Submitted on 29 Jun 2014 ([v1](https://arxiv.org/abs/1406.7515v1)), last revised 30 Nov 2016 (this version, v2)]

Title:Evaluation of educational activities ungraded school teachers: development resources to improve the quality of teaching in a rural school
===============================================================================================================================================

Authors:[Nurassyl Kerimbayev](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Kerimbayev,+N), [Aliya Akramova](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Akramova,+A), [Nurgul Azieva](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Azieva,+N) View a PDF of the paper titled Evaluation of educational activities ungraded school teachers: development resources to improve the quality of teaching in a rural school, by Nurassyl Kerimbayev and 2 other authors
[No PDF available, click to view other formats](#other)
> Abstract:The focus of this article are issues related to the assessment of the teacher, working in small schools. The author analyzes the educational activities ungraded school teacher, as one of the factors increasing the quality of teaching in a rural school. We have tried to consider other resources to successfully solve the problem of increasing the quality of education in rural schools. Teacher in a rural school is a key figure in the training, development and education of children. From his profession, qualification, ability to work with a small but different age student population is entirely dependent and learning outcomes of students. Therefore, the educational activities of teachers of small schools should be analyzed and monitored not only for assessing his work, but with the aim to provide all possible assistance in the specific conditions of ungraded schools.

This article uses the notation and terminology of the first article and assumes its results. In particular, we refer to an $\ell$-group with truncation as a truncated $\ell$-group, or simply a trunc, and denote the category of truncs with truncation morphisms by $\mathbf{AT}$. Title:Evaluation of educational activities ungraded school teachers: development resources to improve the quality of teaching in a rural school
===============================================================================================================================================

Authors:[Nurassyl Kerimbayev](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Kerimbayev,+N), [Aliya Akramova](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Akramova,+A), [Nurgul Azieva](https://arxiv.org/search/cs?searchtype=author&query=Azieva,+N) View a PDF of the paper titled Evaluation of educational activities ungraded school teachers: development resources to improve the quality of teaching in a rural school, by Nurassyl Kerimbayev and 2 other authors
[No PDF available, click to view other formats](#other)
> Abstract:The focus of this article are issues related to the assessment of the teacher, working in small schools. The author analyzes the educational activities ungraded school teacher, as one of the factors increasing the quality of teaching in a rural school. We have tried to consider other resources to successfully solve the problem of increasing the quality of education in rural schools. Teacher in a rural school is a key figure in the training, development and education of children. From his profession, qualification, ability to work with a small but different age student population is entirely dependent and learning outcomes of students. Therefore, the educational activities of teachers of small schools should be analyzed and monitored not only for assessing his work, but with the aim to provide all possible assistance in the specific conditions of ungraded schools.
